title: Chandrababu Naidu backed Heritage Food jumped 43 % in three trading session : Here why
body_text:
Chandrababu Naidu backed Heritage Food jumped 43% in three trading session: Hereâ€™s why
Heritage Foods, a TDP stock, saw a significant surge in its shares, with a 43% increase in the last three sessions and a 55% gain in the last 10 days. Founded by TDP Chief Chandrababu Naidu, the company operates in dairy, retail, and agri sectors. Nara Lokesh, son of N Chandrababu Naidu, is one of the promoters. The company also introduced a new product and saw a remarkable increase too.
